name: Rebel Wings (itch)
description:
Hey all,

We are a team of 3 and this is the first level of our first game as a team. Building a top-down shoot em' up was part of the unity course I was following and we saw this as an opportunity to see if we were able to design and build a game. Our intentions are to build two more levels before wrapping this up but we also want to share what we came up with until now. I hope you enjoy our work.

Thanks and cheers.

-------------------------------------------

-CONTROLS-

W,A,S,D to Move,
SPACE to Shoot,
P to Pause,
Q to Skip the Intro and the Conversations.
